#summary Returns a HTML select tag with years as options.
#labels method,helper,date

By default the option tags will include 11 years, 5 on each side of the current year. You can change this by passing in `start_year` and `end_year`.

|| *Name* || *Required* || *Type* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| start_year || yes || date || || first year in option list ||
|| end_year || yes || date || || last year in option list ||

*Examples:*

{{{
#yearSelectTag(start_year=1900, end_year=year(now()))#
}}}
